item.title: Ideia Rock Show # 31 Especial Metal & Video Game
item.description: Ideia Rock Show #31 – Especial Trilhas de Video Fames Produção e Apresentação: Darci Montanari 01 – Judas Priest – You’ve got Another Thing Coming – NHL 12 02 – Anthrax – I’m Alive – NHL12 03 – Avenged Sevenfold – Not Ready to Die – Call Of Duty Black Ops 04 – The Devil Wears Prada – Escape – Zombie Slay Bloco 2 – Iron Man 2 05 – Soilwork – Exile 06 – Meshuggah – Straws Pulled at Random 07 – Stemm – Awake 08 – Lamb of God – Hit The Wall 09 – Deep Purple – Highway Star – Rock Band 10 – Angel Witch – Angel Witch – Brutal Legend 11 – Metallica – One – Guitar Hero 3 12 – Theater of Tragedy – City of Light – Manhattan Chase 13 – Dead Kennedys – Police Truck – Tony Hawk 14 – Fu Manchu – Evil Eye – Tony Hawk 2 15 – Mastodon – Blood And Thunder – Saints Row 16 – The Sword – Freya – Burn Out Revenge 17 – Motorhead – Killed By Death – Scarface 18 – Sepultura – Slave New World – Backyard Wrestling 19 – Blind Guardian – Sacred – Sacred 2 20 – Lacuna Coil – Swamped – Vampire: Masquerade – The Bloodline 21 – Wolfmother – Back Round – Guitar Hero 5 Myspace: http://www.myspace.com/ideiarockshow Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/groups/205721866158874/ Twitter: @ideiarockshow Website: http://www.wix.com/darcifalacomigo/ideiarockshow Orkut: http://www.orkut.com.br/Main#Community?cmm=117804664

item.title: Ideia Rock Show Especial 20 Anos de Vulgar Display of Power + Lançamentos de 1992
item.description: Ideia Rock Show #30 – Especial Aniversário de 20 Anos do Vulgar Display of Power - Pantera + 1992 Releases Produção/Apresentação: Darci Montanari Playlist 01 - Mouth for War 02 - A New Level 03 - Walk 04 - Fucking Hostile 05 - This Love 06 - Rise 07 - No Good (Attack the Radical) 08 - Live in a Hole 09 - Regular People (Conceit) 10 - By Demons Be Driven 11 - Hollow 12 – Black Sabbath – TV Crimes - Dehumanizer 13 – Suicidal Tendencies – It’s Going Down – The Art Of Rebellion 14 – Fear Factory – Scum Grief – Soul of a new Machine 15 – Iced Earth – Pure Evil – Night of the Sotrmrider 16 – Iron Maiden – Childhood’s End – Fear Of The Dark 17 – Ministry – TV II 18 – Rollins Band – Low Self Opinion 19 – Napalm Death – The World Keeps Turning 20 – Tourniquet – Pathogenic ocular Dissonance 21 – Obituary – The End Complete Myspace: http://www.myspace.com/ideiarockshow Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/groups/205721866158874/ Twitter: @ideiarockshow Website: http://www.wix.com/darcifalacomigo/ideiarockshow Orkut: http://www.orkut.com.br/Main#Community?cmm=117804664

item.title: Ideia Rock Show #28 - Albuns Milionarios
item.description: Ideia Rock Show #28 – Especial Milionários do Rock Produção/Apresentação: Darci Montanari Bloco 01 – Queen – Greatest Hits e Metallica – Black Album - 25 Milhões 01 – Bicycle Race 02 – Bohemian Rhapsody 03 – Through The Never 04 – Enter Sandman Bloco 02 - Guns N Roses – Appetite For Destruction 28 Milhões e Nirvana – Nevermind - 30 Milhões 05 – Welcome to the Jungle 06 – Paradise City 07 – Territorial Pissings 08 – Semlls Like Teen Spirit Bloco 03 - Dire Straits – Brothers in Arms 30 milhões e Beatles – Coletanea 1 – 31 Milhões 09 – The man’s Too Stroong 10 - Money For Nothing 11 – Paperback Writer 12 – Sgt Peppers Lonely Hearst Club Band Bloco 04 - Led Zeppelin – Led Zeppelin IV – 37 Milhões e Meat Loaf – Bat Out of Hell - 43 Milhões 13 – Rock N Roll 14 – Stairway to Heaven 15 – Bat Out of Hell 16 - you took the words right out of my mouth (Hot Summer Night) Bloco 05 - AC/DC – Back in Black – 49 Milhões e Pink Floyd – The Dark Side of The Moon – 50 Milhões 17 – givin the dog a bone 18 – shoot to thrill 19 – The great gig in the sky 20 – Money Myspace: http://www.myspace.com/ideiarockshow Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/groups/205721866158874/ Twitter: @ideiarockshow Website: http://www.wix.com/darcifalacomigo/ideiarockshow Orkut: http://www.orkut.com.br/Main#Community?cmm=117804664
